  • Uses of Color in it.polimi.ingsw.network

    Method parameters in it.polimi.ingsw.network with type arguments of type Color 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void RemoteView.updateColors​(ObservableGame observed, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Color> playerColors)
    When this method is called it informs the player about the color chosen by the other players, if all players have chosen card it change the handler phase and says to the client that he enters in the god selection phase

  • Uses of Color in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers

    Method parameters in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers with type arguments of type Color 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ObservableGame.notifyColors​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Color> playerColors)
